name: Cali Spritz
description: Jon Santer, the owner of Prizefighter in Emeryville, Calif. created this simple spritz to celebrate the recent arrival of Bruto Americano, an Italian-style bitter aperitivo from St. George Distillery. To keep the drink local, he uses California chardonnay as a mixer. The pleasingly pink drink is well balanced; the easygoing quality of the wine contrasts nicely with the aggressive bite of the Americano.
keywords: Bruto Americano, California chardonnay, fresh pink grapefruit juice, Grapefruit twist, summer

recipeInstructions.text: Add liquid ingredients, in order, to a Tom Collins glass filled with ice. Squeeze grapefruit twist over top of drink, then insert it vertically down side of glass. Serve drink with a straw.
